
---
title: "tar_extract"
---

## Pipeline arguments

nextflow run \
https://github.com/openpipelines-bio/openpipeline.git -r main_build \
-main-script target/nextflow/compression/tar_extract/main.nf \
--help

## Table of arguments

| name               | type    | description                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|:-------------------|:--------|:-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| --input            | file    | Input file                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| --output           | file    | Folder to restore file(s) to.                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| --strip_components | integer | Strip this amount of leading components from file names on extraction. For example, to extract only 'myfile.txt' from an archive containing the structure `this/goes/deep/myfile.txt', use 3 to strip 'this/goes/deep/'. |
| --exclude          | string  | Prevents any file or member whose name matches the shell wildcard (pattern) from being extracted.                                                                                                                        |
